name: Vitamin D3
reason: Low vitamin D levels detected in blood test
description: Vitamin D3 is essential for calcium absorption and bone health. It also plays an important role in immune function and mood regulation.
warnings: Do not exceed recommended dosage without medical supervision

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
reason: Elevated triglyceride levels and inflammation markers
description: Omega-3 fatty acids have been shown to reduce inflammation and may help lower risk of chronic diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and arthritis.
warnings: May increase bleeding risk if taking blood thinners
Choose high-quality sources to minimize mercury exposure

name: Magnesium Glycinate
reason: Low magnesium levels and reported muscle cramps
description: Magnesium is involved in over 300 biochemical reactions in the body and is critical for muscle and nerve function, blood glucose control, and bone health.
warnings: May cause digestive upset in some individuals
Should be used with caution in those with kidney disease

name: Probiotic Complex
reason: Gut microbiome imbalance detected in analysis
description: Probiotics help maintain a healthy balance of gut bacteria, which is essential for digestive health, immune function, and even mood regulation.
benefits: May help with bloating and gas
warnings: Start with a lower dose if new to probiotics
Store according to package instructions to maintain potency

name: Vitamin B Complex
reason: Suboptimal B vitamin levels, particularly B12 and folate
description: B vitamins play a vital role in maintaining good health and well-being. They have a direct impact on your energy levels, brain function, and cell metabolism.
benefits: Helps maintain healthy skin and hair
warnings: May cause vivid dreams if taken late in the day
May turn urine bright yellow (normal and harmless)
